title: Team-Based Flipped Learning Design to Enhance Engagement in Psychiatric Nursing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Non-face-to-face/blended learning environments using digital devices to strengthen clinical practical competencies for pre-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners are assessed on collaborative problem-solving skills through mental health nursing case analysis (achieving at least 80% on formative assessment criteria).
Learners complete self-directed learning content for weekly topics using flipped learning materials with over 90% accuracy.
Learners practice communication skills required in mental health nursing practice at least three times through team-based activities (discussions/role-plays).

resources: Mental Health Nursing Simulation Video Materials

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
